00011 void reconfigureCallback(oryx_manager::IMUConfig &config, uint32_t level){
00012         if(config.Compass !=Compass){
00013                 Compass = config.Compass;
00014                 station.Compass=Compass;
00015         }
00016         if(config.Enhancement !=Enhancement){
00017                 Enhancement=config.Enhancement;
00018                 station.Enhancement=Enhancement;
00019         }
00020         if(config.Prediction != Prediction){
00021                 Prediction=config.Prediction;
00022                 station.Prediction = Prediction;
00023         }
00024         if(config.Timestamped != Timestamped){
00025                 Timestamped=config.Timestamped;
00026                 station.TimeStamped=Timestamped;
00027         }
00028         ISD_SetStationConfig(handle,&station,1,FALSE);
00029 }
00030 
00031 sensor_msgs::Imu getIMUData(){
00032         ISD_GetTrackingData(handle, &data);
00033 
00034         sensor_msgs::Imu imu_msg;
00035 
00036         double w                = data.Station[0].Quaternion[0];
00037         double x                = -data.Station[0].Quaternion[1];
00038         double y                = data.Station[0].Quaternion[2];
00039         double z                = -data.Station[0].Quaternion[3];
00040         imu_msg.header.frame_id = "imu";
00041         imu_msg.orientation.w                   = w;
00042         imu_msg.orientation.x                   = x;
00043         imu_msg.orientation.y                   = y;
00044         imu_msg.orientation.z                   = z;
00045         imu_msg.angular_velocity.x              = data.Station[0].AngularVelBodyFrame[0];
00046         imu_msg.angular_velocity.y              = data.Station[0].AngularVelBodyFrame[1];
00047         imu_msg.angular_velocity.z              = data.Station[0].AngularVelBodyFrame[2];
00048 
00049         /*
00050          * The linear acceleration data is useless for this IMU. Instead, we are
00051          * filling it with the euler angles in degrees because it makes parsing
00052          * angles easier. We did not want to convert between quaternions and euler.
00053          */
00054         //TODO: Change back to linear acceleration.
00055         imu_msg.linear_acceleration.x   = data.Station[0].Euler[2];
00056         imu_msg.linear_acceleration.y   = data.Station[0].Euler[1];
00057         imu_msg.linear_acceleration.z   = data.Station[0].Euler[0];
00058 
00059         imu_msg.orientation_covariance[0] = .01;
00060         imu_msg.orientation_covariance[3] = .01;
00061         imu_msg.orientation_covariance[6] = .01;
00062 
00063         imu_msg.linear_acceleration_covariance[0]=999999;
00064         imu_msg.linear_acceleration_covariance[3]=999999;
00065         imu_msg.linear_acceleration_covariance[6]=999999;
00066 
00067         imu_msg.angular_velocity_covariance[0]=1;
00068         imu_msg.angular_velocity_covariance[3]=1;
00069         imu_msg.angular_velocity_covariance[6]=1;
00070         imu_msg.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
00071         return imu_msg;
00072 }
00073 
00074 int main(int argc, char** argv){
00075         ros::init(argc, argv, "InertiaCube");
00076         ros::NodeHandle n;
00077 
00078         tf::TransformBroadcaster imu_tf_broadcaster;
00079         ros::Publisher imu_data_publisher = n.advertise<sensor_msgs::Imu> ("\imu", 1);
00080 
00081         ros::param::get("~Publish_Rate",publishRate);
00082         ros::Rate loopRate(publishRate);
00083 
00084         ISD_OpenAllTrackers(NULL,&handle,FALSE,FALSE);
00085         if (handle <= 0) {
00086                 ROS_ERROR("Tracker Not Found. Try a Different Port");
00087         }
00088         else{
00089                 ROS_INFO("Tracker Found");
00090         ISD_GetStationConfig(handle,&station,1,FALSE);
00091 
00092         if(n.hasParam("Compass")){
00093                 n.getParam("Compass",Compass);
00094                 station.Compass=Compass;
00095         }
00096         if(n.hasParam("Timestamped")){
00097                 n.getParam("Timestamped",Timestamped);
00098                 station.TimeStamped=Timestamped;
00099         }
00100         if(n.hasParam("Compass_Compensation")){
00101                 n.getParam("Compass_Compensation",CompassCompensation);
00102                 station.CompassCompensation=CompassCompensation;
00103         }
00104         if(n.hasParam("Enhancement")){
00105                 n.getParam("Enhancement",Enhancement);
00106                 station.Enhancement=Enhancement;
00107         }
00108         if(n.hasParam("Sensitivity")){
00109                 n.getParam("Sensitivity",Sensitivity);
00110                 station.Sensitivity=Sensitivity;
00111         }
00112         if(n.hasParam("Prediction")){
00113                 n.getParam("Prediction", Prediction);
00114                 station.Prediction=Prediction;
00115         }
00116 
00117         dynamic_reconfigure::Server<oryx_manager::IMUConfig> server;
00118         dynamic_reconfigure::Server<oryx_manager::IMUConfig>::CallbackType f;
00119 
00120         f = boost::bind(reconfigureCallback, _1 ,_2);
00121         server.setCallback(f);
00122 
00123 
00124         ISD_SetStationConfig(handle,&station,1,FALSE);
00125         ISD_ResetHeading(handle, 0);
00126 
00127         while(n.ok()){
00128                 sensor_msgs::Imu imu_msg = getIMUData();
00129                 imu_data_publisher.publish(getIMUData());
00130                 geometry_msgs::TransformStamped imu_trans;
00131                 imu_trans.header.stamp = imu_msg.header.stamp;
00132                 imu_trans.header.frame_id = "world";
00133                 imu_trans.child_frame_id = "imu";
00134 
00135                 imu_trans.transform.translation.x = 0.0;
00136                 imu_trans.transform.translation.y = 0.0;
00137                 imu_trans.transform.translation.z = 0.0;
00138                 imu_trans.transform.rotation.w = imu_msg.orientation.w;
00139                 imu_trans.transform.rotation.x = imu_msg.orientation.x;
00140                 imu_trans.transform.rotation.y = imu_msg.orientation.y;
00141                 imu_trans.transform.rotation.z = imu_msg.orientation.z;
00142                 imu_tf_broadcaster.sendTransform(imu_trans);
00143                 ros::spinOnce();
00144                 loopRate.sleep();
00145         }
00146 
00147         ISD_CloseTracker(handle);
00148         }
00149 
00150 
00151 }
